name: 王順源
objective:
讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.
schedule:
週次       課程內容                                                                    備註
第一週   Fuzzy Introduction
第二週   Classical Sets and Fuzzy Sets
第三週   Classical Sets and Fuzzy Sets
第四週   Fuzzy Sets Operation
第五週   Fuzzy Relations
第六週   Fuzzy Relations
第七週   Linguistic Variable and Fuzzy Rules
第八週   Linguistic Variable and Fuzzy Rules
第九週   期中考
第十週   Fuzzy Logic and Approximate Reasoning
第十一週 Fuzzy Rules Base and Fuzzy Inference Engine
第十二週 Fuzzy Rules Base and Fuzzy Inference Engine
第十三週 Fuzziffers and Defuzzifiers
第十四週 Fuzzy Systems as Nonlinear Mappings
第十五週 Approximation Properties of Fuzzy Systems
第十六週 Fuzzy Control of Linear Systems I -Stable Controllers
第十七週 Fuzzy Control of Linear Systems I -Stable Controllers
第十八週 期末考
scorePolicy:
期中考 40%
期末考 40%
報告作業及平時分數 20%
materials:
模糊理論與應用
模糊控制教材
